settings.text: Welcome to Pots for Tots, a brand of The Family Food Co. We know how important handmade, tasty and nutritious food is for your family, so here at Pots for Tots we’ve got you covered with a diverse range of meals that are plant-based, vegetarian and made without, but we’ve also got a variety of meals containing meat and fish, so there’s something for every little one.

settings.title: Our mission
settings.text: Our aim is to liberate busy parents, and give them precious time back to spend with their family and friends. We want to make meal times easy and convenient, as well as ensuring young children grow up eating nutritious food for every meal.

settings.title: How it works
settings.text: It’s simple, choose your meals and snacks and our chefs will cook, package and deliver them to your door. Our pots come frozen for when you need them. You can make a one time purchase or a regular delivery, how often they come is up to you.

settings.title: Homemade baby food delivery service
settings.text: We deliver handmade baby and toddler meals to busy parents across the UK. Our meals are packaged in little recyclable pots and delivered to your door. We create nutritious meals so you have one less thing to think about.

settings.title: British & Free-range
settings.text: Sourcing the right ingredients is very important to us. We get all our meat from W. Bunting traditional family butchers. It is free-range/grass-fed and responsibly sourced from British farms.

settings.title: Sustainable packaging
settings.text: All our packaging is recyclable! Our pots are made from Kraft paper, our sleeves are made from card, we use recycled denim liners, cardboard boxes, and even the dry ice sachets can go in the recycling bin.

settings.title: What's in our baby & toddler meals?
settings.text: We focus on healthy-hearty baby and toddler food your little ones will actually eat! We always include (hide) 3 or more different vegetables in every meal, to make sure your child is getting the nutrients they need. We have a range of meat, fish and vegetarian recipes to give variety and support a balanced diet.

settings.title: Lucy Dunnett
settings.text: I love that I have some home cooked healthy and nutritious meals I can grab at the last minute. So far my girls have enjoyed every one they've had.

settings.title: Bonie Torbet
settings.text: I love that I have some home cooked healthy and nutritious meals I can grab at the last minute. So far my girls have enjoyed every one they've had.

settings.title: Marnie Wills
settings.text: This couldn't of come at a better time for us! My 3yr old was being very fussy and I was struggling to get her to eat anything else besides pasta.

settings.title: Kiri Wroe
settings.text: My tot absolutely loves your pots, even does a yummy dance with constant yummy noises when she's eating your seasonal risotto!

settings.title: Laura Taylor
settings.text: I ordered some of your pots for my fussy toddler and I've never seen him devour food like it, thank you so much!

settings.title: Lily Williamson
settings.text: They are great to have when I don't have time to cook and it's so nice to know what's in them so I don't get supermarket pouch guilt.
Parenting is an adventure. Through conversations, community and resources we support and connect a diverse group of parents. Sign up for news, offers and more!
